'''Burn Gorman''' is an American-born English actor and musician. He was born in Hollywood, to English parents, while his father was a professor at the University of California.

Gorman is best known for his roles as Owen Harper in ''Torchwood'', as Gottlieb in ''â€‹Pacific Rim,Â ''as William Guppy in ''Bleak House'', as Phillip Stryver in ''The Dark Knight Rises'' (with [[Aidan Gillen]]), as well as appearances in British soap opera ''Coronation Street'', ''Johnny English Reborn'' (with [[Rupert Vansittart]]),Â  2004 film ''Layer Cake'' and the 2012 film ''Red Lights''.

He guest stars in the [[Season 3|third]] and [[Season 4|fourth season]] of ''Game of Thrones'' as [[Karl Tanner]], a deserter of the [[Night's Watch]]. <ref name="Casting update 10-01">[http://winteriscoming.net/2013/01/season-three-casting-update/]</ref>
